name: Console Simulator
description:
This is the perfect representation of a console gaming experience. Just sit on a couch, play an interactive movie in cinematic 30 fps 720p and press X to Win over your enemies.
Don't have money to buy a console but have a dollar to buy a game? Look no further, the experience this game gives is indistinguishable from the real one.



Features:

⚪Play in cinematic 30 fps @ 720p.
⚪Play an interactive movie
⚪Press X to Win
⚪Next gen console graphics
⚪Play a corridor shooter. Shoot waves of zombies to see deep plot cut-scenes and then repeat the loop till you hit the 20 hours mark. Oh, and you also can hunt for loot in side quests, so the game is actually 150 + hours long if complete all of the objectives. So we could sell the game for $99.99 actually but yeah, we are just too kind and sell it for $0.99.
⚪First person view
⚪Immersive gameplay
⚪Play a game inside a game
⚪Gamepad support
⚪Achievements
⚪3d graphics
⚪Satire
